title: When will Tristana skins be available in the shop?
body: Just looking to complete my collection!!!!!

replies.body: Which skin are you looking for in particular?  Most of her skins should be available, with exception to Riot Girl which can be redeemed through Facebook.  What's up?
If you go to the store and look up Tristana skins "Bewitching and Firefighter" are not available or visible, looking at Tristana from the Champion page then clicking her skins shows the 2 there.
